bibl.title: New Funerary Stelae from Kom Abou Bellou.
bibl.note: Publication of eleven unpublished stelae unearthed at the archaeological site of Kom Abou Bellou, in the Western Delta, during rescue excavations (2006-2007). These stelae are now kept in the Giza Pyramid Museum magazine. - Avec résumés en français et en anglais.

bibl.title: Bulletin de l'Institut français d'Archéologie orientale

bibl.seg: Abd El-Ghaffar M. Wagdy & Hassan A. El-Ebiary, New Funerary Stelae from Kom Abou Bellou.

Publication of eleven unpublished stelae unearthed at the archaeological site of Kom Abou Bellou, in the Western Delta, during rescue excavations (2006-2007). These stelae are now kept in the Giza Pyramid Museum magazine. - Avec résumés en français et en anglais.
